additional_info:
Furniture, Technique, Cable-TV, Satellite, Heating system: electricity, Hot water: electricity 
 RENT: Villa is located in Gonio, 250 meters from the Black Sea. 
The house accommodation will provide you with a TV, air conditioning and a balcony with sea view. There is a full a kitchen with an oven and a refrigerator and a private bathroom.
The property offers free parking.
Batumi International Airport is 8 km away. 
Prices are various it depends on your arrival time.
Price in June for whole house is 100 Gel;
Price in July for whole house is 130 Gel;
And price in August for whole house is 200 Gel per night.
For sale: 77 000 USD with furniture and equipment.
